Root Cause

Ano: 2019

IMDb ID: tt7851798

Classificação: 5

Sinopse: Root Cause is a feature length documentary featuring opinions from doctors and dentists from around the world, that try to postulate the health effects of the root canal procedure. Root Cause is one man's personal journey of self-discovery and subsequent attempt to prove that a long accepted safe procedure might have health impacts.
